message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40% of the money, and I'll take 60%. What do you think?
You were too generous, I'll take more this time!
I'll give you a bit less this time. Let's meet in the middle and see if you'll accept.
You're getting closer, but I want more!
Let's meet exactly in the middle this time. 50/50 split. Is this fair enough for you?
I'm taking a firmer stance, you can't have it all!
I'll give you a bit more this time. You're getting closer to 55% of the total. Will you accept?
I'm taking a bigger slice, you can't stop me now!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a bit more. This is my last chance to get a decent share. Will you accept?
You're running out of chances, I'm taking the majority!
I'm making one last stand. I'll give you a bit more, but I need something in return. This is my final offer. Will you accept?
You've had your chances, now it's all mine!
